title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-mobile-sync/ui/ControlPanel/Settings
caption: MobileSync
text:
These settings let you customise the behaviour of TW-MobileSync plugin.

---

!! Sync


!!! Sync Interval

Normally, sync happened in local wiki, so it is free, so you can sync it frequently. This setting takes effect after refresh.

Minutes between sync:

<$edit-text
	tiddler="$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-mobile-sync/Config/SyncInterval"
	field="text"
	default="3"
	tabindex=-1
	focus=false
	cancelPopups="yes"
	fileDrop=no
	tag="input"
/>
